Summary:
Highly experienced Solutions Architect with a strong technical foundation in enterprise IT and a deep understanding of the Energy and Utilities industry. Proven track record of managing and leading teams, and the ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations. Togo certified and experienced in process and robotic automation. Demonstrated ability to drive significant business impact through the development and implementation of innovative solutions. Also, I'm pretty funny (even if no one else thinks so).

Experience:

Solutions Architect
XYZ Company | Jan 2020 - Present

* Designed and implemented solutions for clients in the Energy and Utilities industry, resulting in an average annual cost savings of $500,000 per client
* Worked closely with clients to understand their needs and develop custom solutions, leading to a customer satisfaction rate of 95%
* Led a team of 10 engineers in the development and deployment of solutions, resulting in a project success rate of 100%
* Worked with sales team to develop and deliver technical presentations to potential clients, leading to a conversion rate of 75%
* Participated in the development of proposals and business cases, resulting in a win rate of 90%

Senior Technical Leader
ABC Company | Apr 2015 - Dec 2019
